name: Netrunnerr_2
description:
Netrunnerr_2 beta release - this game is squeal to Netrunnerr  

You play as an Hacker in virtual simulation, Enemies are called The "Net Watch"

Net watch is an Camouflaged  AI made in the virtual world they move fast, keep an eye on them because they can kill you during net running   

Controls

W,A,S,D movement

Left mouse - for shooting (this is used for killing Net watch AI agents)

mouse for camera look this can be used for hacking the flaw's in the cyberspace for money

E to Scan the Area in Cyber Space 

Background Music Inspired from this music source

Reference----->https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i57p-G0Xs2M&t=889s
